data.text: @DSRGenealogist No it is not so sorry for your loss.
@DSRGenealogist I am so sorry for your loss!

@DSRGenealogist I'm so sorry for your loss. I saw pictures of a 1C1R on a ventilator with it right at the start of the pandemic. Scary stuff, but thankfully he pulled through. 

We've just had it and even with this lesser strain and being triple vaxxed, it's not a nice virus to catch.
@DSRGenealogist This is so sad...very sorry...sending a hug of sympathy in your time of loss. https://t.co/BLm7M9eQAz
@DSRGenealogist I am so sory for your loss :(
@DSRGenealogist My condolences Daniel. I've encountered a few families with covid during my census deliveries. Covid definitely hasn't gone away.

@DSRGenealogist I don't know. I am so tired of having to balance what I need to do to keep safe (high-risk group) and what is good for my family (which includes keeping me safe since my son needs his mom).
@yhoitink Thanks Yvette 💓 Pandemic seems to have been lasting an eternity… When will it be over 😫

I stand corrected: Two years* 

(weird, it felt longer…) 😷
